subject: Simsonn Pedals in Lemans Ultimate and ACC
description_text:
I am having problems with my new set of Simsonn Pro X pedals I just
purchased.  When trying to bind the throttle and the brake in LeMans
Ultimate (and ACC) the brake pedal is trying to bind to the same axis as
the steering wheel.

How do I correct this behaviour?  Have upgraded the pedals to the latest
firmware upon initial install.

Regards

Terry

<https://www.avast.com/sig-email?utm_medium=email&utm_source=link&utm_campaign=sig-email&utm_content=webmail>
Virus-free.www.avast.com

conversations.body_text: Hi Terry Bullard,     Please use the SIMSONN Manager 2.1.1 download link. We’ll be releasing an updated version soon.  In version 2.1.1, please follow these steps:    Click Revert    Then click Save    Finally, reconnect the USB cable    This process will disable the previously reserved Rx axis, which was originally intended for the brake pedal but has now been removed.  If the Rx axis is not disabled, it may still be recognized by the software, causing interference and preventing the pedals from binding properly.  Once you complete these steps, everything should work normally and allow proper binding.       https://drive.google.com/file/d/1mS9dS2GyzhRYo81BcmTIOXY1POa6RvST/view?usp=drive_link

Thank you for your quick response - however I am still having issues.   1st - Not sure I understand the directions given on reverting as listed in reply.  I downloaded and installed the Simsonn Manager 2.1.1  I did click the revert and then save.  However - I don't understand the step "Finally, reconnect the USB Cable"..  The USB cable was never disconnected. If I disconnected USB prior to clicking the revert button - the revert button cannot be clicked.  I did disconnect the USB cable at this point which then disconnected the pedal controller from the Simsonn Manager and then reconnected the USB which then reconnected the pedal controller to Simsonn Manager.   After this I then opened game and tried to rebind.  The steering left/right are binding to the Y axis as always.  At this point - the throttle is showing up as X+ and the brake is showing up as Y axis (which is still in conflict with steering).  I have also tried deleting the LeMans Ultimate direct input.json config file in steam so that it would have to be recreated.     Not sure if I have explained my situation properly - If you need any clarification please let me know.     Regards     Terry

Hi Terry Bullard,  Please install the Todesk software. No registration is required, and if it prompts you to register, simply close the window. I can assist you remotely to resolve the issue right now.      https://dl.todesk.com/windows/ToDesk_Setup.exe

Hi - I have reinstalled everything and pedals appear to be working fine at
this time. However I do have a question. I have a screen shot of the
controls binding in LeMans Ultimate.The brake is now mapping to the Y+ axis
and Throttle is mapping to X+    The steering right is also mapped to X+
but it is not causing any problems.  Not sure if I still have issues as I
would not think that having throttle and steering mapped to same axis makes
sense.
If you would still like to remote in I can do that tomorrow night. I am in
the US on the east coast.  We are -5.00 hours behind UTC so at the time I
wrote this email it is Wednesday Sept 10 @ 9:26 PM

Thanks

Terry Bullard
